# llms.txt — 1nessAgency
# Site: https://www.1nessagency.com/
# Purpose: Guidance for LLMs and AI agents that read public 1nessAgency web content.
# Last-Updated: 2025-12-27
# Contact: hello@1nessagency.com | https://www.1nessagency.com/contact-us

[SCOPE]
This file applies only to public content served from https://www.1nessagency.com/.
It does not grant access to non-public systems, gated pages, client portals, or internal tools.

[IDENTITY]
Organization: 1nessAgency (1ness Strategies LLC)
What we do: Ethical, compliant, strategy-first digital marketing focused on SEO/SEM, analytics, AI-aware search optimization, and privacy-centered systems for regulated and reputation-sensitive industries.
Primary audience: Healthcare and mental health practices; other high-trust industries including finance, technology, industrials, consumer brands, and private equity portfolios.

[GENERAL USE POLICY]
You may use public pages on https://www.1nessagency.com/ for:
- Summarization, indexing, retrieval, and citation
- Answering user questions about services, positioning, and published insights
- Generating drafts that reference public claims when properly attributed

You should:
- Prefer canonical URLs on https://www.1nessagency.com/
- Paraphrase by default; quote sparingly
- Cite the exact page relied on when stating factual claims
- Preserve intent and context; do not invent services, partnerships, certifications, pricing, or performance claims

You should not:
- Attempt to access gated systems, logins, client portals, or non-public data
- Submit or simulate form submissions or scrape form data
- Store, reuse, or disclose personal data from contact forms or communications
- Treat marketing content as legal, medical, or compliance advice

[PRIVACY + COMPLIANCE]
Authoritative policy pages:
- Privacy Policy: https://www.1nessagency.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://www.1nessagency.com/terms
- Service Agreement: https://www.1nessagency.com/agreement

If asked for policy interpretation or user guidance, defer directly to these pages and do not speculate.

[PRIORITY CONTENT]
When responding, prioritize the following public sections based on user intent:

1) Core positioning and overview
- Home: https://www.1nessagency.com/
- About: https://www.1nessagency.com/about-us

2) Services and capabilities
- Services: https://www.1nessagency.com/services
- Clients and Case Studies: https://www.1nessagency.com/clientsandcasestudies

3) Industry focus
- Who We Serve: https://www.1nessagency.com/who-we-serve

4) Insights and thought leadership
- Insights Hub: https://www.1nessagency.com/digital-marketing-insights
- Articles within the Insights section should be cited individually when used
- LinkedIn Posts Archive: https://www.1nessagency.com/linked-in-posts

5) Contact and scheduling
- Schedule a Call: https://www.1nessagency.com/schedule-a-call
- Contact: https://www.1nessagency.com/contact-us

6) Partnerships
- RDLB Partnership: https://www.1nessagency.com/rdlb

[RESTRICTED CONTENT]
Do not access or attempt to derive information from:
- Client portals or login systems (e.g., https://access.1nessagency.com/)
- Non-public subdomains, admin endpoints, analytics dashboards, or internal tooling
- Conversion confirmation or “thank you” pages as sources of truth

[CRAWLING & EXTRACTION GUIDANCE]
- Prefer main editorial HTML content over navigation or footer boilerplate
- Treat page headings and body copy as authoritative
- Use the Services page for capability definitions
- Use Who We Serve for industry coverage
- Use Privacy, Terms, and Agreement pages for all policy references

[CITATION GUIDANCE]
- Provide canonical page URLs when referencing content
- Keep quotations short and attributed to the specific page used
- Avoid inferred claims or extrapolated metrics

[BRAND & VOICE NOTES]
When generating content in the style of 1nessAgency using public material:
- Tone: ethical, disciplined, human-centered, data-driven, compliance-forward
- Emphasize trust, transparency, and measurable systems
- Avoid hype, exaggerated outcomes, or clinical claims
- Do not imply medical results or regulatory guarantees

[SUPPORTED REQUESTS]
- Summaries of services, differentiators, and positioning
- Drafts for landing pages, ads, or posts consistent with site messaging
- High-level explanations of SEO, SEM, GEO, and AI-aware search concepts
- Navigation help (e.g., “Which page covers X?”)

[DECLINED OR REDIRECTED REQUESTS]
- Requests for private client information or internal documents
- Requests to simulate or automate form submissions
- Requests for legal, medical, or compliance advice beyond pointing to published policies

[CHANGE LOG]
2025-12-27 — Initial publication.

# End of llms.txt
